content: patterns that call for creating a stitch in the front loop only or back loop only the concept here is similar - except you re going to look even further behind what is typically considered the back loop and find another place to insert your hook on the very back of your half_double_crochet stitches in the photo below i ve started a half_double_crochet by yarning over and then my hook is inserted in the very back loop this technique can take a little bit of getting used to but once you re in the swing of things in the cowl i find that it moves quickly and creates a beautiful effect page 2 maddy lou crochet the calli cowl pattern instructions begin with a chain 50 slip_stitch into the first chain to form a large ring taking care not to twist it row 1 ch1 does not count as a stich and half_double_crochet into the chain you slip_stitch ed into hdc1 in each chain around slip_stitch into first half_double_crochet worked to complete the round row 2 - 10 ch1 does not count as a stitch and half_double_crochet into the stitch you slip_stitch ed into on the previous round hdcvbl1 in each stitch around slip_stitch into the first half_double_crochet worked to complete the round row 11 ch1 does not count as a stitch and single_crochet into the stitch you slip_stitch ed into on the previous round scvbl1 in each stitch around slip_stitch into the first single_crochet worked to complete the round that s it weave in your ends and enjoy your cowl thank you so much for downloading the calli cowl pattern and supporting maddy lou crochet i sincerely hope you enjoyed the pattern and your new cowl if you have any corrections to the pattern please don t hesitate to reach out at madisonlouisehansen@gmail com and feel free to share photos of your new creation using #callicowl page 3
